metadata.description: Who is Barry Steakfries? Struggling gramophone salesman by day, jetpack-stealing sleeveless adventurer also by day! He's got a shirt-ripping disease and there is no cure! He's part Bruce Campbell, part Marty McFly, all action! With the help of his friends (a robot dog that's way smarter than him and a robot bird that shoots money), Barry tortures the evil scientists of Legitimate Research by stealing jetpacks faster than they can manufacture them. An all-new comic book based on the massively popular retro video game Jetpack Joyride!
metadata.name: Barry Steakfries: From The Files Of Jetpack Joyride
